summary: This document is an email exchange from August 14, 2019, between two individuals discussing the news about Jeffrey Epstein's death. The sender expresses shock and anger about the situation, calling it unfair for the victims, and offers support to the recipient who appears to be working on the case.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the email discussion; the news about him from the weekend (presumably his death) is described as horrible and unfair for the victims.

events.title: Epstein's Death
events.description: News from the weekend about Jeffrey Epstein; described as horrible and unfair for the victims, prompting shock and anger.

keyFacts: The email is dated August 14, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The sender expresses strong emotional reaction ("livid") to the news about Epstein, calling it "horrible and unfair for the victims."
The recipient appears to be part of a team ("the office") working on the Epstein case, and the sender expresses a wish to help.
The document reflects the immediate shock and concern within professional circles following Epstein's death.
